title: When Should I Go Full-Time With My Side Hustle? (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

Accepting a gift that would pay off debt,

Going full-time with your side hustle,

Buying a car after getting laid off,

Is $1.5m in real estate debt worth the risk?
